answers.answer: No it just means the baby is healthy. If the doc didnt seem concerned then u shouldnt worry
Oh no not at all some babies just grow faster!
Congrats. And no worries means shes eating well !(: what r ur cravings with her??
Ok thanks everyone! I just got concerned, I don't want her getting too big and wind up having a c section or something!
Congrats I found out I'm having a baby girl on Friday too!! Super excited they didn't tell me what the baby weighed though
No your baby is most likely going to come before your estimated due date.Thats all cause due dates are only estimates
The ultrasound can be off on weight so don't worry and some babies are just a bit bigger. Its only 4 oz

question: I had a sonogram on Friday and found out I'm carrying a healthy 14 oz girl (: I was reading on the week by week development that my baby should only weigh 10.5 oz. should I be concerned? Is this a sign of gestational diabetes?
title: 21 weeks
